00017 static const double RECOIL_SENSOR_THICKNESS = 0.52;

00026     EventDisplay::EventDisplay() : TGMainFrame(gClient->GetRoot(), 1000, 600) {
00027 
00028         TEveElement* ecal = drawECAL();
00029         TEveElement* recoilTracker = drawRecoilTracker();
00030 
00031         detector_->AddElement(ecal);
00032         detector_->AddElement(recoilTracker);
00033 
00034         gEve->AddElement(detector_);
00035         gEve->Redraw3D(kTRUE);
00036 
00037         //SetCleanup(kDeepCleanup);
00038 
00039         TGVerticalFrame* contents = new TGVerticalFrame(this, 100,200);
00040         TGHorizontalFrame* commandFrame1 = new TGHorizontalFrame(contents, 100,0);
00041         TGHorizontalFrame* commandFrame2 = new TGHorizontalFrame(contents, 100,0);
00042         TGHorizontalFrame* commandFrame3 = new TGHorizontalFrame(contents, 100,0);
00043 
00044         TGButton* buttonClose = new TGTextButton(commandFrame3, "&Exit", "gApplication->Terminate(0)");
00045         commandFrame3->AddFrame(buttonClose, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsExpandX));
00046 
00047         TGButton* buttonPrevious = new TGTextButton(commandFrame2, "Previous Event");
00048         commandFrame2->AddFrame(buttonPrevious, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsExpandX));
00049         buttonPrevious->Connect("Pressed()", "ldmx::EventDisplay", this, "PreviousEvent()");
00050 
00051         TGButton* buttonNext = new TGTextButton(commandFrame2, "Next Event");
00052         commandFrame2->AddFrame(buttonNext, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsExpandX));
00053         buttonNext->Connect("Pressed()", "ldmx::EventDisplay", this, "NextEvent()");
00054 
00055         textBox_ = new TGTextEntry(commandFrame1, new TGTextBuffer(100));
00056         commandFrame1->AddFrame(textBox_, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsExpandX));
00057 
00058         TGButton* buttonGoTo = new TGTextButton(commandFrame1, "Go to Event");
00059         commandFrame1->AddFrame(buttonGoTo, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsExpandX));
00060         buttonGoTo->Connect("Pressed()", "ldmx::EventDisplay", this, "GotoEvent()");
00061 
00062         contents->AddFrame(commandFrame1, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsExpandX | kLHintsExpandY));
00063         contents->AddFrame(commandFrame2, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsExpandX | kLHintsExpandY));
00064         contents->AddFrame(commandFrame3, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsExpandX | kLHintsExpandY));
00065 
00066         AddFrame(contents, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsExpandX | kLHintsExpandY));
00067 
00068         SetWindowName("Event Display");
00069 
00070         MapSubwindows();
00071         Resize();
00072         MapRaised();
00073         MapWindow();
00074     }

00076     bool EventDisplay::SetFile(const char* file) {
00077 
00078         file_ = TFile::Open(file);
00079 
00080         if (!file_) {
00081             std::cout << std::endl;
00082             std::cout << "Input root file cannot be opened." << std::endl;
00083             return false;
00084         }
00085 
00086         tree_ = (TTree*) file_->Get("LDMX_Events");
00087 
00088         if (!tree_) {
00089             std::cout << std::endl;
00090             std::cout << "Input file contains no tree \"LDMX_Events\"" << std::endl;
00091             return false;
00092         }
00093         eventNumMax_ = tree_->GetEntriesFast();
00094 
00095         ecalDigis_ = new TClonesArray("ldmx::EcalHit");
00096         recoilHits_ = new TClonesArray("ldmx::SimTrackerHit");
00097 
00098         return true;
00099     }

00101     void EventDisplay::PreviousEvent() {
00102         GotoEvent(eventNum_ - 1);
00103     }
00104 
00105     void EventDisplay::NextEvent() {
00106         GotoEvent(eventNum_ + 1);
00107     }
00108 
00109     bool EventDisplay::GotoEvent(int event) {
00110 
00111         gEve->GetCurrentEvent()->DestroyElements();
00112 
00113         if (event > eventNumMax_ || event < 0) {
00114             std::cout << "Event number out of range." << std::endl;
00115             return false;
00116         }
00117         eventNum_ = event;
00118 
00119         printf("Loading event %d.\n", eventNum_);
00120 
00121         if (hits_) {
00122             hits_ = new TEveElementList("Reco Hits");
00123             hits_->IncDenyDestroy();
00124         }
00125         else {
00126             hits_->DestroyElements();
00127         }
00128         tree_->GetEntry(eventNum_);
00129         tree_->SetBranchAddress("ecalDigis_recon", &ecalDigis_);
00130         tree_->SetBranchAddress("RecoilSimHits_sim", &recoilHits_);
00131         TEveElement* ecalHitSet = drawECALHits(ecalDigis_);
00132         TEveElement* recoilHitSet = drawRecoilHits(recoilHits_);
00133 
00134         hits_->AddElement(ecalHitSet);
00135         hits_->AddElement(recoilHitSet);
00136         gEve->AddElement(hits_);
00137 
00138         gEve->Redraw3D(kFALSE);
00139 
00140         return true;
00141     }
00142 
00143     bool EventDisplay::GotoEvent() {
00144 
00145         int event = atoi(textBox_->GetText());
00146         if (event == 0 && textBox_->GetText() != "0") {
00147             std::cout << "Event number must be a positive integer!" << std::endl;
00148             return false;
00149         }
00150         GotoEvent(event);
00151         return true;
00152     }
00153 
00154     TEveStraightLineSet* EventDisplay::drawHexColumn(Double_t xCenter, Double_t yCenter, Double_t frontZ, Double_t backZ, Double_t h, Int_t color, const char* colName) {
00155 
00156         TEveStraightLineSet* lineset = new TEveStraightLineSet(colName);
00157         // Add the bins
00158         Double_t x[6], y[6];
00159         Double_t sqrt_three = sqrt(3);
00160         Double_t a = h / sqrt_three;
00161         Double_t xstart = xCenter - a;
00162         Double_t ystart = yCenter;
00163 
00164         // Go around the hexagon
00165         x[0] = xstart;
00166         y[0] = ystart;
00167         x[1] = x[0] + a / 2.0;
00168         y[1] = y[0] + a * sqrt_three / 2.0;
00169         x[2] = x[1] + a;
00170         y[2] = y[1];
00171         x[3] = x[2] + a / 2.0;
00172         y[3] = y[1] - a * sqrt_three / 2.0;
00173         x[4] = x[2];
00174         y[4] = y[3] - a * sqrt_three / 2.0;
00175         x[5] = x[1];
00176         y[5] = y[4];
00177 
00178         for (int nline = 0; nline < 6; ++nline) {
00179 
00180             int nextpt = nline+1;
00181             if (nline == 5) {
00182                 nextpt = 0;
00183             }
00184 
00185             lineset->AddLine(x[nline], y[nline], frontZ, x[nextpt], y[nextpt], frontZ);
00186             lineset->AddLine(x[nline], y[nline], backZ, x[nextpt], y[nextpt], backZ);
00187             lineset->AddLine(x[nline], y[nline], frontZ, x[nline], y[nline], backZ);
00188         }
00189 
00190         lineset->SetLineColor(color);
00191         return lineset;
00192     }
00193 
00194     TEveBox* EventDisplay::drawBox(Float_t xPos, Float_t yPos, Float_t frontZ, Float_t xWidth, Float_t yWidth, Float_t backZ, Float_t zRotateAngle, Int_t lineColor, Int_t transparency, const char* name) {
00195 
00196         TEveBox *box = new TEveBox(name);
00197 
00198         Float_t vs[8][3] = {
00199                 {xPos-xWidth/2,  yPos-yWidth/2,  frontZ},
00200                 {xPos+xWidth/2,  yPos-yWidth/2,  frontZ},
00201                 {xPos+xWidth/2,  yPos+yWidth/2,  frontZ},
00202                 {xPos-xWidth/2,  yPos+yWidth/2,  frontZ},
00203                 {xPos-xWidth/2,  yPos+yWidth/2,  backZ},
00204                 {xPos+xWidth/2,  yPos+yWidth/2,  backZ},
00205                 {xPos+xWidth/2,  yPos-yWidth/2,  backZ},
00206                 {xPos-xWidth/2,  yPos-yWidth/2,  backZ}
00207         };
00208 
00209         Float_t rotatedvs[8][3];
00210 
00211         for (int m = 0; m < 8; ++m) {
00212 
00213             TVector3 rotatedVec = {vs[m][0],vs[m][1],vs[m][2]};
00214             rotatedVec.RotateZ(zRotateAngle);
00215             rotatedvs[m][0] = rotatedVec[0];
00216             rotatedvs[m][1] = rotatedVec[1];
00217             rotatedvs[m][2] = rotatedVec[2];
00218         }
00219 
00220         box->SetVertices(*rotatedvs);
00221         box->SetLineColor(lineColor);
00222         box->SetMainTransparency(transparency);
00223 
00224         return box;
00225     }
00226 
00227     TEveElement* EventDisplay::drawECAL() {
00228 
00229         TEveElement* ecal = new TEveElementList("ECAL");
00230 
00231         static const std::vector<double> xPos = {0, 0, 0, 170*sqrt(3)/2, -170*sqrt(3)/2, -170*sqrt(3)/2, 170*sqrt(3)/2};
00232         static const std::vector<double> yPos = {0, 170, -170, 85, 85, -85, -85};
00233         static const std::vector<double> zPos = {-252.75, 246.75};
00234 
00235         for (int col = 0; col < xPos.size(); ++col) {
00236 
00237             char colName[50];
00238             sprintf(colName, "Tower %d", col);
00239             TEveStraightLineSet* hexCol = drawHexColumn(xPos[col], yPos[col], zPos[0]+ECAL_Z_OFFSET, zPos[1]+ECAL_Z_OFFSET, 170, kCyan, colName);
00240             ecal->AddElement(hexCol);
00241         }
00242 
00243         return ecal;
00244     }
00245 
00246     TEveElement* EventDisplay::drawECALHits(TClonesArray* hits) {
00247         static const double layerZPos[] = {-250.5,-237.75,-225.0,-212.25,-199.5,-186.75,-174.0,-161.25,-148.5,-135.75,-123.0,-110.25,-97.5,-84.75,-72.0,-59.25,-46.5,-33.75,-21.0,-8.25,4.5,17.25,30.0,    42.75,55.5,68.25,81.0,93.75,106.5,119.25,132.0,144.75,157.5,170.25,183.0,195.75,208.5,221.25,234.0,246.75};
00248 
00249         ldmx::EcalHexReadout hex;
00250         ldmx::EcalDetectorID detID;
00251 
00252         double edepMax = 0.0;
00253         ldmx::EcalHit* hit;
00254 
00255         for (TIter next(hits); hit = (ldmx::EcalHit*)next();) {
00256 
00257             if (hit->getEnergy() > edepMax) {
00258 
00259                 edepMax = hit->getEnergy();
00260             }
00261         }
00262 
00263         TEveRGBAPalette* palette = new TEveRGBAPalette(0,edepMax);
00264         TEveBoxSet* ecalHitSet = new TEveBoxSet("ECAL Hits");
00265         ecalHitSet->SetPalette(palette);
00266         ecalHitSet->Reset(TEveBoxSet::kBT_AABox, kFALSE, 64);
00267 
00268         for (TIter next(hits); hit = (ldmx::EcalHit*)next();) {
00269 
00270             double energy = hit->getEnergy();
00271             detID.setRawValue(hit->getID());
00272             detID.unpack();
00273             int layer = detID.getFieldValue("layer");
00274             std::pair<float, float> xyPos = hex.getCellCentroidXYPair(detID.getFieldValue("cell"));
00275 
00276             ecalHitSet->AddBox(xyPos.first, xyPos.second, layerZPos[layer-1]+ECAL_Z_OFFSET, 3, 3, 3);
00277             ecalHitSet->DigitValue(energy);
00278         }
00279 
00280         ecalHitSet->SetPickable(1);
00281         ecalHitSet->SetAlwaysSecSelect(1);
00282         return ecalHitSet;
00283     }
00284 
00285     TEveElement* EventDisplay::drawRecoilHits(TClonesArray* hits) {
00286 
00287         // In mm
00288         static const double stereo_strip_length = 98; // 2 mm deadspace
00289         static const double mono_strip_length = 78; // 2 mm deadspace
00290 
00291         ldmx::SimTrackerHit* hit;
00292         TEveElement* recoilHitSet = new TEveElementList("Recoil Hits");
00293 
00294         for (TIter next(hits); hit = (ldmx::SimTrackerHit*)next();) {
00295 
00296             std::vector<float> xyzPos = hit->getPosition();
00297 
00298             if ((xyzPos[2] > 4 && xyzPos[2] < 5) || (xyzPos[2] > 19 && xyzPos[2] < 20) || (xyzPos[2] > 34 && xyzPos[2] < 35) || (xyzPos[2] > 49 && xyzPos[2] < 50)) {
00299 
00300                 TEveBox *recoilHit = drawBox(xyzPos[0], 0, xyzPos[2], 1, stereo_strip_length, xyzPos[2]+RECOIL_SENSOR_THICKNESS, 0, kYellow, 0, "Recoil Hit");
00301                 recoilHitSet->AddElement(recoilHit);
00302 
00303             } else if ((xyzPos[2] > 10 && xyzPos[2] < 11) || (xyzPos[2] > 40 && xyzPos[2] < 41)) {
00304 
00305                 TVector3 rotPos = {xyzPos[0], xyzPos[1], xyzPos[2]};
00306                 rotPos.RotateZ(-STEREO_ANGLE);
00307 
00308                 TEveBox *recoilHit = drawBox(rotPos[0], 0, xyzPos[2], 1, stereo_strip_length, xyzPos[2]+RECOIL_SENSOR_THICKNESS, STEREO_ANGLE, kYellow, 0, "Recoil Hit");
00309                 recoilHitSet->AddElement(recoilHit);
00310 
00311             } else if ((xyzPos[2] > 25 && xyzPos[2] < 26) || (xyzPos[2] > 55 && xyzPos[2] < 56)) {
00312 
00313                 TVector3 rotPos = {xyzPos[0], xyzPos[1], xyzPos[2]};
00314                 rotPos.RotateZ(STEREO_ANGLE);
00315 
00316                 TEveBox *recoilHit = drawBox(rotPos[0], 0, xyzPos[2], 1, stereo_strip_length, xyzPos[2]+RECOIL_SENSOR_THICKNESS, -STEREO_ANGLE, kYellow, 0, "Recoil Hit");
00317                 recoilHitSet->AddElement(recoilHit);
00318 
00319             } else if (xyzPos[2] > 65) {
00320                 if (fabs(xyzPos[1]) > 1.0) { // dead region
00321 
00322                     if (xyzPos[1] > 0) {
00323 
00324                         TEveBox *recoilHit = drawBox(xyzPos[0], mono_strip_length/2+1, xyzPos[2], 1, mono_strip_length, xyzPos[2]+RECOIL_SENSOR_THICKNESS, 0, kYellow, 0, "Recoil Hit");
00325                         recoilHitSet->AddElement(recoilHit);
00326                     } else {
00327 
00328                         TEveBox *recoilHit = drawBox(xyzPos[0], -mono_strip_length/2-1, xyzPos[2], 1, mono_strip_length, xyzPos[2]+RECOIL_SENSOR_THICKNESS, 0, kYellow, 0, "Recoil Hit");
00329                         recoilHitSet->AddElement(recoilHit);
00330                     }
00331                 }
00332             }
00333         }
00334 
00335         return recoilHitSet;
00336     }
00337 
00338     TEveElement* EventDisplay::drawRecoilTracker() {
00339 
00340         // In mm
00341         static const double stereo_x_width = 40.34;
00342         static const double stereo_y_width = 100;
00343         static const double mono_x_width = 50;
00344         static const double mono_y_width = 80;
00345 
00346         const std::vector<double> xPos = {-2*mono_x_width, -mono_x_width, 0, mono_x_width, 2*mono_x_width};
00347         const std::vector<double> yPos = {-mono_y_width/2, mono_y_width/2};
00348         const std::vector<double> zPos = {7.5, 22.5, 37.5, 52.5, 90.0, 180.0};
00349 
00350         TEveElement* recoilTracker = new TEveElementList("Recoil Tracker");
00351         for (int j = 0; j < 4; ++j) {
00352 
00353             char nfront[50];
00354             sprintf(nfront, "Stereo%d_front", j+1);
00355 
00356             char nback[50];
00357             sprintf(nback, "Stereo%d_back", j+1);
00358 
00359             TEveBox *front = drawBox(0, 0, zPos[j]-STEREO_SEP, stereo_x_width, stereo_y_width, zPos[j]-STEREO_SEP+RECOIL_SENSOR_THICKNESS, 0, kCyan, 100, nfront);
00360 
00361             if (j % 2 == 0) { // Alternate angle for back layer of a stereo pair.
00362                 TEveBox *back = drawBox(0, 0, zPos[j]+STEREO_SEP, stereo_x_width, stereo_y_width, zPos[j]+STEREO_SEP+RECOIL_SENSOR_THICKNESS, STEREO_ANGLE, kCyan, 100, nback);
00363                 recoilTracker->AddElement(back);
00364             } else {
00365                 TEveBox *back = drawBox(0, 0, zPos[j]+STEREO_SEP, stereo_x_width, stereo_y_width, zPos[j]+STEREO_SEP+RECOIL_SENSOR_THICKNESS, -STEREO_ANGLE, kCyan, 100, nback);
00366                 recoilTracker->AddElement(back);
00367             }
00368 
00369             recoilTracker->AddElement(front);
00370         }
00371 
00372         int module1 = 1;
00373         for (int x = 0; x < 5; ++x) {
00374             for (int y = 0; y < 2; ++y) {
00375 
00376                 char name[50];
00377                 sprintf(name,"Mono1_%d",module1);
00378                 ++module1;
00379 
00380                 if (x % 2 != 0) { // Alternate mono layer z by defined separation.
00381                     TEveBox *front = drawBox(xPos[x], yPos[y], zPos[4]-MONO_SEP, mono_x_width, mono_y_width, zPos[4]-MONO_SEP+RECOIL_SENSOR_THICKNESS, 0, kCyan, 100, name);
00382                     recoilTracker->AddElement(front);
00383                 } else {
00384                     TEveBox *back = drawBox(xPos[x], yPos[y], zPos[4]+MONO_SEP, mono_x_width, mono_y_width, zPos[4]+MONO_SEP+RECOIL_SENSOR_THICKNESS, 0, kCyan, 100, name);
00385                     recoilTracker->AddElement(back);
00386                 }
00387             }
00388         }
00389 
00390         int module2 = 1;
00391         for (int x = 0; x < 5; ++x) {
00392             for (int y = 0; y < 2; ++y) {
00393 
00394                 char name[50];
00395                 sprintf(name,"Mono2_%d",module2);
00396                 module2++;
00397 
00398                 if (x % 2 != 0) { // Alternate mono layer z by defined separation.
00399                     TEveBox *front = drawBox(xPos[x], yPos[y], zPos[5]-MONO_SEP, mono_x_width, mono_y_width, zPos[5]-MONO_SEP+RECOIL_SENSOR_THICKNESS, 0, kCyan, 100, name);
00400                     recoilTracker->AddElement(front);
00401                 } else {
00402                     TEveBox *back = drawBox(xPos[x], yPos[y], zPos[5]+MONO_SEP, mono_x_width, mono_y_width, zPos[5]+MONO_SEP+RECOIL_SENSOR_THICKNESS, 0, kCyan, 100, name);
00403                     recoilTracker->AddElement(back);
00404                 }
00405             }
00406         }
00407 
00408         return recoilTracker;
00409     }
